title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI copilot that talks to your local Ollama instance for shell/code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that brings local Ollama completions into your editor.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean React chatbot frontend that consumes the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js client for Ollama with TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat & generate endpoints.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack (Ollama + GPU support + WebUI + monitoring).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: End-to-end RAG template using LangChain + Ollama + Chroma in a single repo.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into channels with @ mentions.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles (CodeLlama, SQLCoder, Zephyr) ready for Ollama.
